definitions.definition: (interrogative) Who ever: an emphatic form of who.
definitions.example: Whoever thought up that stupid idea?

definitions.definition: (fused relative) Any person or persons that.
definitions.example: Whoever breaks the law will be punished.

definitions.definition: (fused relative) The person that (no matter who).
definitions.example: I don't know what it is. Ask whoever put it there.

definitions.definition: Regardless of the person or persons that.
definitions.example: Whoever stole the painting, the police will catch the thief in no time.
I don't care who gets it; give it to whoever.

definitions.definition: Misspelling of who ever other than in interrogative use.
definitions.example: *He is the tallest man whoever lived. (incorrect usage)
